data.name: Candy Monsters
data.detailed_description:
Candy Monsters is a fantastic puzzle combined game full of excitement and joy! Explore the scary candy maps, helping A Mumia franklin A Coledar everyone so that your grandmother doesn't discover new and delicious adventures!



Game:
- Excellent delicious and addictive gameplay
- Hundreds of challenging and unique match-3 levels
- Phases with time, ice, fire, chocolate, etc .....
- Different models of candy colors...
- Fire Bat Boosters help and crush candy
-Ghost boosters to mix candy
-Ax Boosters for Candy Crushing
-More than 500 Exciting Phases
- No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play
- Hundreds of best levels according to the rules for your entertainment
- In 4 languages ​​​​English, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese .... More languages ​​​​to be added
Candy Monsters

data.short_description: Candy Monsters is a match 3 game! Allowing you to make different matches !Create bombs with various effects !Use bats to crush the candy! with more than 500 levels, super fun and challenging! game with over 200 hours of game play! distract and call your friends to have fun! play now
data.supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sistema operacional de 64 bits, processador baseado em x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4005U CPU @ 1.70GHz 1.70 GHz
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel(R)HD Grphics Family
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sistema operacional de 64 bits, processador baseado em x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4005U CPU @ 1.70GHz 1.70 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel(R)HD Grphics Family
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
